entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 12:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: S 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
